#ROOT# <utterance> A: The taxi drivers are on strike again . <utterance> B: What for ? <utterance> A: They want the government to reduce the price of the gasoline . <utterance> B: It is really a hot potato .

#ROOT# <utterance> A: We've managed to reduce our energy consumption in our factory by about 15 per cent in the last two years . <utterance> B: That's excellent . How have you managed that ? <utterance> A: Mainly because we've invested in a heat recovery system . <utterance> B: What does that mean exactly ? <utterance> A: Well , we use the exhaust gases from our printing presses to provide energy to heat our dryers . <utterance> B: What other sources of energy do you use ? <utterance> A: We don't use any fossil fuels . Most of our power comes from hydro-electric plants . We're hoping to use even more energy from alternative sources in the future - perhaps even wind power .
